content: crocheted soap sacks *make a slip knot on hook and chain 5 *join last chain to the first with a slip_stitch to make a ring *round 1 chain 1 work 12 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch *round 2 increase chain 1 *work 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch you ll have 18 double_crochet *round 3 increase repeat round 2 you ll have 27 double_crochet *round 4 chain 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join with slip st in beginning chain *rounds 5-10 repeat round 4 *round 11 chain 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet around join with slip st in beginning chain *at the end of row 11 chain 14 join end of chain to the edge of the sack with a slip st and fasten_off weave in ends approximate size of finished soap sack 4 x 6 inches cotton and cotton blend yarns only facebook @soapsack email stacy needle@comcast net
